thread.title: Brenda Provey
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Brenda Provey

author: Brenda Provey
title: Brenda Provey
text: From the moment we walked into the store and were greeted with all employees dressed very professionally (very rare in today's work force) until our delivery today we were very impressed. Our salesman, Clint, was very personable and knowledgeable. The delivery men were very efficient and pleasant. I will continue to recommend Gardner White to everyone. Thank you very much.
